author: gdaniels
msg: Remove from HEAD (argh - I'm concerned this will screw up the
branch too... cross fingers)

author: gdaniels
msg: First cut at refactoring ServiceDesc into an interface with a Java-specific
implementation.  Use the interface wherever possible, and only drop down
to the Java version in places like JavaProvider where you know what
to expect.
This should allow us to build ServiceDescs for other backends (i.e.
BSF/COM) and use appropriate code for managing the relevant
metadata.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch
'refactorServiceDesc'.

author: susantha
msg: modified Axis code base to avoid the problem describe at,
http://gcc.gnu.org/ml/gcc-prs/2002-08/msg00020.html
Changes are,
1. Avoided multiple inheritance
2. Avoided virtual inheritance
3. Interfaces that have one to one mapping to the C function pointer tables were separated to a new interfaces (IWrapperSoapSerializerBase, IMessageDataBase etc).

author: susantha
msg: Commiting modified code to th CWrapperSupport branch. This change includes,
1. Modification of the code base to support C wrappers
2. Simple Server side C Wrapper (completely C web service)
